DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to determine the clinical cure rates of pelvic organ prolapse from subjects that had a robotic-assisted sacrocolpopexy using Alyte Y mesh and Restorelle Y smartmesh lightweight mesh.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of 2 Lightweight Y-meshes After Laparoscopic Sacrocolpopexy
DOC.criteria: All patients who underwent roboticassisted laparoscopic sacrocolpopexy between January 2007 to August 2011 using either Alyte Ymesh or Restorelle Ymesh Refusal to participate in our longterm outcome study
